tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE waste_transportation (
    route_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    route_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_location VARCHAR(255),
    end_location VARCHAR(255),
    schedule_time TIME
)

CREATE TABLE waste_transportation_routes (
 id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 route_name VARCHAR(50),
 start_location VARCHAR(100),
 end_location VARCHAR(100),
 distance DECIMAL(10,2),
 departure_time TIMESTAMP,
 arrival_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE transportation_schedules (
 schedule_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 route_id UUID REFERENCES waste_transportation_routes(id),
 vehicle_id UUID,
 driver_name VARCHAR(50),
 vehicle_type VARCHAR(50),
 scheduled_departure TIMESTAMP,
 scheduled_arrival TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE WasteRoutes (
    route_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    route_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_location VARCHAR(255),
    end_location VARCHAR(255),
    distance_km FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE WasteCollection (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    route_name TEXT,
    pickup_location TEXT,
    pickup_time TIMESTAMP,
    driver_name TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE WasteDisposal (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    disposal_location TEXT,
    disposal_time TIMESTAMP,
    disposal_method TEXT,
    disposal_cost DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE RouteSchedule (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    route_name TEXT,
    route_distance DECIMAL,
    pickup_time TIMESTAMP,
    delivery_time TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE Driver (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    driver_name TEXT,
    driver_license TEXT,
    driver_phone TEXT,
    driver_email TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Vehicle (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_type TEXT,
    vehicle_plate TEXT,
    vehicle_capacity DECIMAL,
    vehicle_status TEXT
)
